data.text:
@RyanRomeike @omac_ute Yeah.  Luckily I've seen some in that category lean to positive peer pressure. Also as more and more get it and we see positive effects, that'll help at least in some places.
We really need to fix the whole problem with not everyone having a shared set of facts/reality though.

@theonlyju1 @omac_ute Yeah. I still know far too many people who are too nervous to get the vaccine. They’re not anti-maskers, anti-vaxxers, or think this is all a hoax meant to take away their freedom either. That worries me that I’m seeing so much reluctance.

@RyanRomeike @omac_ute The rollout has been so well done. We all need to talk to our friends and neighbors and encourage them to #GetVaccinated. Utah is doing worse than a lot of other states as far as % of ppl getting vaccinated so far, and I think that's a demand issue.
